name: kbase
description: A web-based note-taking application inspired by Obsidian and Joplin

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && ENV=development uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.kill:dev: pkill -f 'uvicorn app.main:app' || true && pkill -f 'node' || true && pkill -f 'concurrently' || true
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && uv sync && uv pip install -e ".[dev]"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
